name: design-tokens-cover-api
description: A pretty noice API providing nice covers for all your design tokens for your design system documentation

scripts.vercel-build: yum install libuuid-devel libmount-devel zlib && cp /lib64/{libuuid,libmount,libblkid,libz}.so.1 node_modules/canvas/build/Release/ && npm run build

author: yannglt
